statements: SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE purchase_amount > 1000 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC, purchase_amount ASC
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE purchase_amount < 500 ORDER BY customer_name
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers WHERE purchase_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' AND phone_number LIKE '555%'
SELECT customer_id, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customers WHERE purchase_amount = (SELECT MAX(purchase_amount) FROM customers)
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3 ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 2 AND purchase_amount > 50.00;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE c.customer_id = 4 ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, total_purchases FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000 ORDER BY total_purchases DESC, customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, p.purchase_date, p.purchase_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.purchase_amount > 500;
SELECT SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_spent FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 2000 ORDER BY total_spent DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(purchase_id) AS purchase_count FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id HAVING purchase_count >= 2 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT segment_name, customer_count FROM segments WHERE customer_count >= 100 ORDER BY segment_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 1 AND purchase_amount > 50;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount FROM customers ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, purchase_amount FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT segment_name, customer_count FROM segments WHERE customer_count > 500 ORDER BY customer_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, total_purchases FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 1000;
SELECT * FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, s.segment_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_segments cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id JOIN segments s ON cs.segment_id = s.segment_id;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE total_purchases > 100;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT segment_name, segment_description FROM segments ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.purchase_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.purchase_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, s.segment_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_segments cs ON c.customer_id = cs.customer_id JOIN segments s ON cs.segment_id = s.segment_id WHERE cs.customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT purchase_id, total_amount, purchase_date FROM purchases ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.product_name, pp.quantity FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id JOIN purchases_products pp ON p.purchase_id = pp.purchase_id WHERE pp.quantity > 1;
